data.comment: The match is underway in Orebro.
Throw-in Orebro.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Malmo at Behrn Arena.
Orebro needs to be cautious. Malmo have an attacking throw-in.
Malmo's Ola Toivonen goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Malmo.
Malmo's Soren Rieks breaks free at Behrn Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Orebro have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Throw-in for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
In the minute 8, In Orebro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team replace Martin Broberg with David Seger.
David Seger is on target to give Orebro a 1-0 advantage.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Malmo push upfield but Victor Wolf quickly pulls them for offside.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orebro's half?
In the minute 13, Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
Jo Inge Berget is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Orebro have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Orebro.
Orebro drive upfield and Jake Larsson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Malmo defender.
Orebro have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Orebro close to the penalty box.
The match at Behrn Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Anders Christiansen, who is down injured.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
In the minute 20, Victor Wolf awards the away team a throw-in.
Isaac Thelin for Malmo drives towards goal at Behrn Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Anders Christiansen, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Erdal Rakip is the substitute for Malmo.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Nahir Besara puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Ola Toivonen of Malmo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 25, Victor Wolf signals a throw-in for Malmo, close to Orebro's area.
Goal kick for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for Malmo in Orebro.
Malmo drives forward and Soren Rieks gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Orebro to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
In the minute 29, Orebro's David Seger gets in a shot on goal at Behrn Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 31, Oscar Lewicki for Malmo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
Victor Wolf signals a Orebro throw-in in Malmo's half.
In the minute 33, At Behrn Arena, Orebro are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Malmo are coming forward and Eric Larsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 34, Orebro have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Malmo's Isaac Thelin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro.
In the minute 42, Free kick Orebro.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 43, Michael Almeback for Orebro has been booked by Victor Wolf and receives a first yellow card.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo.
Malmo pushes forward through Ola Toivonen, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Malmo.
At Behrn Arena the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Orebro.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Orebro.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Malmo.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Throw-in for Malmo at Behrn Arena.
In the minute 47, Malmo to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
Malmo push forward at Behrn Arena and Ola Toivonen gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Orebro defence.
An attacking Orebro player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 48, Goal! The home team extend their lead to 3-1 thanks to a penalty from Nahir Besara.
Victor Wolf awards the away team a throw-in.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Orebro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Malmo's Soren Rieks is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orebro's half?
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Orebro in the half of Malmo.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jo Inge Berget.
Victor Wolf signals a Orebro throw-in in Malmo's half.
Malmo needs to be cautious. Orebro have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 61, Victor Wolf awards Malmo a goal kick.
In Orebro Malmo attack through Isaac Thelin. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
In the minute 63, Jo Inge Berget is back on the pitch.
Goal kick for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Deniz Hummet (Orebro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Orebro.
Deniz Hummet (Orebro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Orebro Orebro drive forward through Deniz Hummet. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 66, Orebro have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Nahir Besara for Orebro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Amin Sarr is replacing Soren Rieks for the away team.
Jon Dahl Tomasson is making the team's third substitution at Behrn Arena with Adi Nalic replacing Ola Toivonen.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 70, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Malmo's Isaac Thelin breaks free at Behrn Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orebro's half?
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 74, Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Orebro in the half of Malmo.
Jo Inge Berget (Malmo) has received a yellow card from Victor Wolf.
In the minute 75, Malmo push forward at Behrn Arena and Jonas Knudsen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orebro defence.
Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
Throw-in for Orebro in the half of Malmo.
In the minute 77, In Orebro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
Victor Wolf signals a Orebro throw-in in Malmo's half.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Erdal Rakip gets his shot on target but fails to score for Malmo.
In the minute 79, Albin Granlund (Orebro) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Malmo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 81, Orebro make their second substitution with Benjamin Hjertstrand replacing Michael Almeback.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Malmo's Amin Sarr is on target but unsuccessful.
At Behrn Arena, Kevin Wright has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Malmo at Behrn Arena.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a Orebro throw-in in Malmo's half.
Rasmus Karjalainen is on a sub for Deniz Hummet for Orebro.
In the minute 86, Simon Amin is replacing Johan Martensson for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Orebro.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo.
In Orebro, Anel Ahmedhodzic (Malmo) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in Malmo.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Orebro goal kick.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
Orebro have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-2.
Malmo are back in the match in Orebro. Adi Nalic has scored to make it 3-2.
Jo Inge Berget instrumental with a fine assist.
